alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 4:54AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES TO IMPACTS THE AREA TODAY... .Most of the heavy snow should end by sunrise, with light snow continuing on and off through much of the day, with additional light accumulations expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches for a storm total of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Portions of south central, west central, and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Although the heaviest will end early this morning, additional accumulations continue to impact travel through today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Somerset
